mapper.update: update userchatdetails set chat_id = #{chatId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, news_text = #{newsText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, statr_time = #{statrTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_send_msg_id = #{userSendMsgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_msg_id = #{userMsgId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, chat_id, news_text, statr_time, user_send_msg_id, user_msg_id from userchatdetails
